participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.background: I will be enjoying my time off with my family and friends. I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion. I have not done anything since high school. Now I also work at a bank. I enjoy watching sci-fi movies because they are often thought-provoking and inspire me to think about the future.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.background: I'm from a tall family in the Midwest. I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood. I like the color blue or red. I would like to spend more time with my family. I owe 2 monitors for work.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing good, just relaxing and watching some old movies.
Mostly Disney movies, I grew up watching them.
I love Disney movies too, they're so nostalgic.
Yeah, they really are. I remember watching The Little Mermaid and The Lion King all the time when I was a kid.
Me too! Those were my favorites.
What about you, what are some of your favorite Disney movies?
I love Beauty and the Beast, Cinderella, and Mulan.
Those are all great movies! I love the music in Beauty and the Beast.
I'm glad you like Disney movies too.
Me too! They're so much fun to watch.
Yeah, they really are. I'm glad I found someone else who likes them.
Me too! We should watch some Disney movies together sometime.
That would be fun! We could have a Disney movie marathon.
That sounds like a great idea
